alling those people liars or frauds or whatever you want to call it! There =
are hundreds of files posted here that are the results members of this grou=
p have gotten during their sessions. If you listen to them, the results are=
 there. The members of this group are giving you the evidence to listen .=
=C2=A0
As an example, Frank related the contents of a session . I don't rec=
all him calling that information a personal prediction of his, yet you said=
 you were writing that down as one of his predictions. =C2=A0Please do not =
insult others and then be =C2=A0surprised when people are offended.
